extension.description: Extension allows to manage your Virtual Machines right from Visual Studio Code
virtualbox-extension.saveStateVM: Stop the Virtual Machine (State will be saved)
virtualbox-extension.stopAllVms: Stop all Virtual Machines (State will be saved)
virtualbox-extension.poweOffAllVms: Power off all Virtual Machines (State will be lost)
virtualbox-extension.poweroffVm: Power off the Virtual Machine (State will be lost)
